## isSquare() function

Tests if a matrix is square.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isSquare(matrix: Matrix<any>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrix | <code>Matrix&lt;any&gt;</code> | The matrix to check |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

`true` if `matrix` is square

## Remarks

A matrix is square if it has the same number of rows as columns.
